__e: Excuse me sir, but .. Sergeant Wallace just reported with the letter.
I'm with the agent who took it off Wallace.
Wallace has already killed the magistrate and taken control of the town.
Now, they are planning something big, Mr. Wallace, and the Precogs could be our only hope to see it before it hits us.
Splendid. But there's a difference between Wallace and me...
I think we're in over our head.
